bio:
I started playing soccer at the age of 7 and have loved the game ever since.
Academics are very important to me, so I am looking for a college environment where I can continue to grow as a student while also playing the sport I love. Im currently looking to pursue a degree in Sports Media/Communications and hope to work with a sports team after graduation. 
I play Forward for Olathe East HS and split time between Forward and outside defender for my club team, primarily on the left side. Over the last 2 years I have also taken on an increased role as a set piece specialist for both club and HS team.  In the offseason I have been focused on improving my attacking skills and my right foot shot. 
Coming from a larger high school, I would prefer a medium to larger sized school with an active campus life and a variety of clubs and organizations to interact with. I'm open to all regions of the country and am willing to leave the midwest to pursue college.
